title: Do you really understand what you don't understand? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a reasonable sense of topics I do not understand. I can make a pretty thorough list. I can also make a list of things I “think” I understand but are really just my opinions. Then, I can make another list of things I understand as well or better than 98+% of the public (mostly in my engineering specialty, of course).
Do you really understand what you don't understand? I understand how little I understand, which is almost nothing at all, about anything.
that’s very Zen, go to this places and ask your questions Zen - Dharma Wheel Zen Space - Zen Space Forum now go! little grasshopper. cheers
